name: bitrise-cache
description: Cache artifacts using Bitrise cache backend with GitHub Actions interface compatibility

scripts.build: npm run build:binaries && npm run build:js
scripts.build:js: ncc build src/main.js -o dist/main && ncc build src/post.js -o dist/post && ncc build src/restore-main.js -o dist/restore && ncc build src/save-main.js -o dist/save
